TMEGATVBOX TMEGATVBOX. TMEGATVBOX. en all http://www.megatvbox.co.uk/ http://www.megatvbox.co.uk/
video audio image executable
Put all your favourites bits of all your favourites addons into one easy to use addon. Ваша мультимедийная библиотека. Super Favourites is a better way of managing your Kodi Favourites.[CR][CR]Virtually any menu item within Kodi can be added to Super Favourites, even from addons that don't normally provide this feature.[CR][CR]Super Favourites allows you to better manage your Kodi favourites, including the creation of sub-folders, into which your Kodi favourites can then be copied or moved into.[CR][CR]This allows you to create you own custom addon with just the best bits of your favourite addons. Search your favourite addons, play your favourite music, read your favourite comic strips, select your favourite playlists, browse your favourite movies, listen to your favourite radio stations, watch your favourite cartoons, the possibilities are endless, all from within one easy to use addon. Super Favorites - лучший способ управления вашим Избранным в Kodi.[CR][CR]Фактически любой пункт меню в Kodi может быть добавлен в Super Favorites, даже из аддонов, которые обычно не предоставляют эту функцию. all en GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE. Version 2, June 1991 http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?tid=192662
https://github.com/spoyser/spoyser-repo/tree/master/plugin.program.super.favourites seanpoyser at gmail.com
1.0.56: 19th February 2017 - added optional initial path, and include play folder parameters to quicklaunch script usage: xbmc.runscript(special://home/addons/plugin.program.super.favourites/quicklaunch.py,folder1/folder2,True) - fixed playlist parsing - fixed quicklaunch in Krypton - fixed launching ExecuteBuiltin types from the quick launch dialog - fixed launching playable items added from FileManager - fixed launching playable items from widgets - various other fixes due to changes in Krypton
$ADDON[plugin.program.super.favourites 30002] !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(SF_STD_CONTEXTMENU_ENABLED)) + !StringCompare(Container.PluginName,plugin.program.super.favourites)
$ADDON[plugin.program.super.favourites 30047] !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(SF_STD_ADDTOFAVES_ENABLED)) + !StringCompare(Container.PluginName,plugin.program.super.favourites)
$ADDON[plugin.program.super.favourites 30259] !IsEmpty(Window(Home).Property(SF_STD_DOWNLOAD_ENABLED)) + Player.IsInternetStream

Project Cypher Hey One and All, Project Cypher takes no responsibility for the content or reliability of the feeds. Project Cypher [B]Does Not[/B] host any of the feeds or Streams. Most of the Code from this addon was taken from many other addons but used under the GNU GENERAL PUBLIC LICENSE Version 2, June 1991. Please remember this is a free 3rd party addon so if something doesn't work! Its FREE! I Made this addon as a hobby Not as a service to anyone and i do not charge for it and shouldn't be treated as such. If you see any form of infringements, please contact appropriate media file owners or host sites immediately. Cypher Media is not an official part of the media player you are running, and therefore not to be mentioned within official support channels, this addon has nothing to do with the media player itself, nor it’s intended use, it is simply a 3rd party plugin which has been added to your system or that you have freely installed. all - -

[add] MPEG-DASH support for Kodi 17 w/ inputstream.adaptive add-on or SPMC 16 w/ builtin-in [add] optional History and Watch Later custom playlist to Settings -> Folders, or (My)Playlists context menu to set/remove [add] Maintenance section to Settings [add] 'Subtitle language(s) to download' selection to Settings -> General [add] 'Force SSL Certificate verification' to Settings -> Advanced [upd] API key set switching from Settings -> API (this will log you out) [upd] Dual login only required if My Subscriptions folder is enabled at sign-in [upd] setting content type from episodes, now videos [del] override view options [upd] Norwegian strings [torstehu] [upd] Greek strings [twilight0] [upd] Portuguese strings [Wanilton] [upd] Dutch strings [flemlion] [fix/upd] API tweaking and various other updates

FTV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG Guia de TV amb suport de XMLTV i flux de dades FTV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG FTV Guide erlaubt es Ihre Live TV Plugins mit einem TV Guide zu kombinieren Οδηγός Τηλεόρασης με XMLTV και υποστήριξη ροών FTV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG FTV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG TV Guide con XMLTV y soporte para streaming Guide TV avec support du XMLTV et du streaming Guide télé avec prise en charge de XMLTV et de la lecture en transit Guía de TV con soporte XMLTV e transmisións מדריך תכניות עם תמיכה ב-XMLTV והזרמה TV vodič sa XMLTV podrškom i podrškom streamanja Panduan Siaran TV dengan dukungan XMLTV dan streaming Guida TV con supporto XMLTV e streaming XMLTV와 스트리밍을 지원하는 TV Guide TVgids met XMLTV en streaming ondersteuning TV Guide obsługujący XMLTV oraz transmisję strumieniową Guia TV com suporte XMLTV e transmissões Guia de TV com XMLTV e suporte para transmissão online TV Program s podporou XMLTV a streamovania TV-guide med XML-TV och strömningsstöd 支持XMLTV和流的电视指南 FTV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG Guia de TV amb suport de XMLTV i flux de dades TV Guide med XMLTV og streaming support FTV Guide erlaubt es Ihre Live TV Plugins mit einem TV Guide zu kombinieren Οδηγός Τηλεόρασης με XMLTV και υποστήριξη ροών FTV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG TFTV Guide allows you to combine some of your favourite live TV plugins for use with a fully working EPG TV Guide con XMLTV y soporte para streaming Guide TV avec support du XMLTV et du streaming Guide télé avec prise en charge de XMLTV et de la lecture en transit Guía de TV con soporte XMLTV e transmisións מדריך תכניות עם תמיכה ב-XMLTV והזרמה TV vodič sa XMLTV podrškom i podrškom streamanja Panduan Siaran TV dengan dukungan XMLTV dan streaming Guida TV con supporto XMLTV e streaming XMLTV와 스트리밍을 지원하는 TV Guide TVgids met XMLTV en streaming ondersteuning TV Guide obsługujący XMLTV oraz transmisję strumieniową Guia TV com suporte XMLTV e transmissões Guia de TV com XMLTV e suporte para transmissão online TV Program s podporou XMLTV a streamovania TV-guide med XML-TV och strömningsstöd 支持XMLTV和流的电视指南 FTV Guide is based on the original TV Guide addon by twinther.

MediaPortal's Titan Skin portiert für Kodi mit jeder Menge Funktionen. MediaPortal's Titan skin ported to Kodi enriched with lot's of features. De Titanskin van MediaPortal is geconverteerd naar Kodi en verrijkt met talloze functionaliteiten all GPL v2.0 http://forum.kodi.tv/forumdisplay.php?fid=212 http://forum.kodi.tv/forumdisplay.php?fid=212
icon.png fanart.jpg _screenshots/screenshot000.jpg _screenshots/screenshot001.jpg _screenshots/screenshot002.jpg _screenshots/screenshot003.jpg _screenshots/screenshot004.jpg _screenshots/screenshot005.jpg _screenshots/screenshot006.jpg _screenshots/screenshot007.jpg _screenshots/screenshot008.jpg _screenshots/screenshot009.jpg
Follow the forum thread about the latest news for the skin. Also have a look at the Trello board to be informed about the skin development: https://trello.com/b/VPlkyvMp/titan-skin
